title: Login to environment
custom_preconds:
(username/password: admin-boc-all/beginathens975)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

title: Navigate to Advanced Search
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has logged into the test site [C146632]
custom_steps: **WHEN the user clicks magnifying glass icon located in the top navigation panel**
custom_expected: THEN the Advanced search screen will display

title: Search for Professional Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to Advanced Search [C146636]
AND "Professional Player" is selected in "Search For" dropdown 
**AND "Club" is selected for first dropdown under Filter 
AND "Is" is selected for second dropdown**
custom_steps:
**WHEN the user selects "San Diego Padres" in the third dropdown**
AND clicks Search
custom_expected: THEN results will display

title: Open Active Professional Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has run an advance search for Professional Players whose club is San Diego Padres [C146637]
AND is viewing Results
custom_steps:
WHEN the user finds a player that has a Roster Status of Active
AND clicks on the Player's Name
custom_expected: THEN the Players profile will display on the Player History Tab

title: Click Contracts Tab on Players Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to an Active Players profile [C146648]
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Contracts tab
custom_expected: THEN the Contracts tab will display with Contract History Widget

title: Create New Major Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Contract's tab of a Player's Profile [C146650]
AND the system has checked if player has Preliminary Contract, 
IF yes then Open Preliminary Contract and Click Delete 
AND Click Yes on Pop-up Message
IF no preliminary contract is found, proceed with test case
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Create New button on Contract history 
AND selects Major Contract
custom_expected: THEN a new Major Contract will display

title: Fill out required fields and Update Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a new Major Contract for a professional Player [C146651]
AND has filled out Required fields that are located on the contract form: 
Signing Date 
Life Insur. Prov. Date
Authorizing Signature
Base Salary (enter value 100,000)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Update Status 
AND selects Terms submitted
custom_expected:
THEN the contract will update successfully 
AND will reload in view mode 
AND the status will be Terms Submitted

title: Delete Major Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C146653] (which means they have a contract in a Terms Submitted state)
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks Update Status > Preliminary
AND user clicks Delete
custom_expected: THEN contract is deleted

title: Locate Agents Widget
custom_preconds: **GIVEN the user has logged into the test site [C146687]**
custom_steps:
**WHEN the user clicks "Utilities" found in left navigation 
AND clicks "Agent/Agency" tab**
custom_expected: THEN the Agents widget should display

title: Create New Agent Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has located the Agents widget [C146674]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Create New button on the Agents Widget
custom_expected: THEN a new blank Agents Profile will load

title: Save Agent Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing a new blank Agent profile [C146675]
AND has filled out required fields located on the form: 
Last Name 
First Name 
Agency 
Phone Number (must be 10 digits long)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN the new agent profile will be saved and load successfully in view mode

title: Search for Professional Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to Advanced Search [C178376]
AND "Professional Player" is selected in "Search For" dropdown 
AND "Club" is selected for first dropdown under Filter 
AND "Is" is selected for second dropdown
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects "Minnesota Twins" in the third dropdown
AND clicks Search
custom_expected: THEN results will display

title: Open Active Professional Player Profile

GIVEN the user has run an advance search for Minnesota Twins Players [C198168]
AND is viewing Results
custom_steps:
WHEN the user finds a player that has a Roster Status of Active
AND clicks on the Player's Name
custom_expected: THEN the Players profile will display on the Player History Tab

title: Click Contracts Tab on Players Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to an Active Players profile [C178378]
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Contracts tab
custom_expected: THEN the Contracts tab will display with Contract History Widget

title: Create New Major Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Contract's tab of a Player's Profile [C178379]
AND the system has checked if player has Preliminary Contract, 
IF yes then Open Preliminary Contract and Click Delete 
AND Click Yes on Pop-up Message
IF no preliminary contract is found, proceed with test case
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Create New button on Contract history 
AND selects Major Contract
custom_expected: THEN a new Major Contract will display

title: Fill out required fields and Open Pay Schedule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a new Major Contract for a professional Player [C146651]
AND has filled out Required fields that are located on the contract form: 
Signing Date 
Life Insur. Prov. Date
Authorizing Signature
Base Salary (enter value 100,000)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks PAY SCH button found under Pay Sch column in Major League Compensation section
custom_expected: THEN a pay schedule pop-up will appear for the user to schedule payments for the compensation

title: Fill out Pay Schedule
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the pay schedule from [C178428]
custom_steps:
WHEN the sets the payment date to 8/1/2016 
AND enters 50,000 in Principal Amount 
AND enters 2.5 in Interest Rate
custom_expected: THEN fields fill out as expected

title: Calculate Payment Amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C180416]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Calc button located under Payment Amount column
custom_expected: THEN the Payment amount will calculate and populate in the field

title: Add row to payment schedule
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C180418]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks add row
custom_expected: Then a new payment row will appear

title: Fill out and Calculate second payment
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added a row to payment schedule [C180419]
custom_steps:
WHEN the users fills out Payment Date with value of (Year from the current date)
AND Principal Amount of 50,000
AND Interest Rate of 2 
AND user clicks Calc button located next to Payment Amount
custom_expected:
THEN system should calculate the payment around
AND Payment amount should be more than the Principle around(should include the interest rate)
AND the OK button will become active

title: Fill out second payment and click OK
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user completed [C1217529]
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks OK button
custom_expected: THEN the payment schedule will be dismissed

title: Navigate to Rosters Tab

custom_steps: WHEN they click the Rosters tab at the top

title: Click Create new for player that is active on MN Roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Rosters tab [C180422]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the create new icon for an Active player found on the MN roster widget
custom_expected: THEN the create new popup will appear

title: Select Major Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked create new icon for an active player on the MN roster widget [C180423]
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes the first dropdown to Contract
AND selected Major Contract in the second contract
custom_expected: THEN a new Major contract will load for the player
